description.narrative: Insatsen avser separata utvärderingar av två Senegalbaserade organisationer, Tostan och Gorée Institute, inom ramen för portföljen för Fred och Säkerhet, anslaget för regionalt utvecklingssamarbete.

The Swedish Embassy in Addis Abeba intends to do a call-off from the framework agreement for evaluation services concerning separate evaluations of two Senegal based organisations: Tostan and Gorée Institute. The call-off is made in accordance with the rules of the framework agreement of renewed competition.
In 2010 Sida entered into an agreement with the Senegal based organisation Tostan for support to the programme ”Promoting peace and security from the grassroots up in the region of West Africa" for the period 2010-2013. Thereafter the organisation has been granted an extension of the agreement with additional funding. The activity period of the final amendment ends in September 2016. The original agreement from 2010 stipulates an evaluation to be conducted 2012. After dialogue with the organisation this evaluation has been postponed and is now planned to take place during 2016 in accordance with the last agreement extension.
Sida and Gorée Institute entered into Agreement in 2012 regarding a programme support for the period 2012-2014. This organisation has also been granted an extension of the agreement with additional funding. The activity period of the final amendment ends in December 2016. The original agreement from 2012 stipulates an evaluation to be conducted 2014. After dialogue with the organisation this evaluation has been postponed and is now planned to take place during 2016 in accordance with the last agreement extension.
Both organisations belong in the peace and security sector and implement their programmes in West Africa. The consultant should have a thorough understanding of the regional perspective and a very good ability to conduct the evaluation in French. Therefore, an assessment has been made that a call-off should be made for both evaluations. The call-off is made in accordance with the rules of the framework agreement of renewed competition
The mission is defined in the Terms of Reference attached to this decision and call-off proposal.

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution
